result.execSummary:
The defendant Rebecca A. Holzem was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Methamphetamine Precursors [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.65.
  • Possession of Methamphetamine [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(g).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Rebecca A. Holzem

records.descr: Notice and acknowledge of def voting ineligibility

records.addlTxt:
2:40 PM Defendant Rebecca A. Holzem in court, in custody.  Attorney Elizabeth R. Gebert in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Cana G Kohn in court for Rebecca A. Holzem. State gives plea agreement plea to Ct's 2 & 3, DRI 1 & 4, ct 2 withheld sentence 4 years probation, costs, DNA Sample/Surcharge, Completion of AODA and follow through with treatment recommendations, Maintain Absolute Sobriety. Maintain full time employment/30 hours/week or apply for at least 5 jobs/week qualified for or 100 hours community service, counseling as deemed beneficial by agent, ct 3 impose 1 year jail, stay 4 years probation, costs, DNA Surcharge & comply with conditions as set forth in Ct 2. Plea questionnaire and waiver of rights filed and gone over with def. Def. understands charges and penalties.  Ct 2 Poss Meth precursors, ptac, no contest plea & Ct 3 Poss of Meth, ptac, no contest plea.  State grants State motion to DRI Ct's 1 & 4. Def. advised of constitutional rights & J.T. rights.  Def. understands elements.  Atty Kohn is satisfied. Court finds pleas are freely & voluntarily given.  Factual basis.  Court finds factual basis, accepts plea and finds def. Guilty to Ct 2 Poss Meth precursors, ptac & Ct 3 Poss of Meth, ptac.  State gives sentencing remarks.  Atty Kohn gives sentencing remarks. Def. has nothing to say. Court gives ruling & orders on 
ct 2 withheld sentence 4 years probation, costs, $250 DNA Sample/Surcharge, Completion of AODA and follow through with treatment recommendations, Maintain Absolute Sobriety. Maintain full time employment/30 hours/week or apply for at least 5 jobs/week qualified for, counseling as deemed beneficial by agent, & ct 3 impose 1 year jail, huber privileges stay 4 years probation, costs, $250 DNA Surcharge & comply with conditions as set forth in Ct 2.  Def. advised of firearm and voting rights. 72 days credit if revoked. If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered, without further order of the court, against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt. Def. advised of postconviction rights.
Plea/sentencing hearing on June 14, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

1:08 PM in Room 301. Defendant Rebecca A. Holzem in court with attorney Cana G Kohn.  Defendant Rebecca A. Holzem in custody at Langlade County Jail.  Kelly Hays appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Rebecca A. Holzem appeared by video means with Attorney. All appearances are by Zoom. Attny Kohn indicates Def. wants to waive P.H; Def. agrees.  Waiver of PH reviewed. Def. understands, waives preliminary hearing. Court accepts waiver of P.H., finds probable cause and binds over filing of Information. Information filed. Attny Kohn acknowledges receipt, waives reading, enters pleas of not guilty. Court receives pleas of not guilty.  Status conference scheduled for June 27, 2022 at 11:00 am.

02:44 PM Defendant Rebecca A. Holzem in court with attorney Cana G Kohn, via zoom.  Defendant Rebecca A. Holzem in custody.  Kelly L Hays appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Rebecca A. Holzem appeared by video means with Attorney, via zoom.  Atty Kohn has copy of complaint, waives reading, bond set and requesting timely preliminary hearing. Bond continues.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 24, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: 01:44 PM Defendant Rebecca A. Holzem in court, in custody.  Elizabeth R. Gebert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Rebecca A. Holzem appeared by video means. All parties via zoom.  Court reviews status of counsel report. Def. will wait for attorney. Court heard on 10 days for p.h. to be set and finds good cause.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 16, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

No contact with Curtis Suriano & Chance Kratochvil.
No illegal use or possession of controlled substances

03:24 PM Defendant Rebecca A. Holzem in court, in custody.  Kelly L Hays appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Rebecca A. Holzem appeared by video means.  All parties via zoom.   Def. has copy of complaint, advised of charges and penalties.  Def. given atty rights and given 3 options, PD, hire own or court appointed atty. Def. did contact P.D. and will continue to wait.  State request bond in GF case continue into this case.  Def. would like lower bond. Bond continues. Court orders $3500 cash bond with conditions.  Initial appearance scheduled for May 9, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

No contact with Curtis Suriano & Chance Kratochvil. 
No illegal use or possession of controlled substances.

Court calls @ 1:09 pm.  Elizabeth Gebert appears via zoom.  Defendant is in custody and via zoom. State gives facts for probable cause and possible charges Maintain/Mnf Meth, Poss of Meth & Poss of Drg Paraph with other charges. 
State gives bail/bond recommendation. Court advised of attorney rights. Def. heard on bond. Court questions defendant.  Court orders $3,500 cash bond with No contact with Curtis Suriano & Chance Kratochvil &  No illegal use or possession of controlled substances. Court will reserve right to be heard on bond @ later date. Initial appearance 4-18-22 @ 1:30. Def. heard on medical appt.
